Containers.Name: hpsahba
Containers.Description:
This Plugin enables/disables HBA mode on some HP Smart Array controllers and installs the tool 'hpsahba'. As mentioned in the Github Repo: _CAUTION: This tool will destroy your data and may damage your hardware!_ For further information go to the source Github repository: https://github.com/im-0/hpsahba.
Warning, this "workaround" comes with a few downsides: - You have to set the controller type to SAT to get temperature readings. - TRIM might now work (needs further testing).
Tested on following hardware so far: HP Smart Array P410i HP Smart Array P420i Firmware Version 6.0 HP Smart Array P812 Hewlett-Packard Company Smart Array G6 controllers / P410 (PCI ID: 103c:323a, board ID: 0x3243103c, firmware: 6.64) Hewlett-Packard Company Smart Array G6 controllers / P212 (PCI ID: 103c:323a, board ID: 0x3241103c, firmware: 6.64)
